# containsMovieFragments

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether at least one movie fragment extends the movie file.

## Declaration

```swift
var containsMovieFragments: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is `YES` if [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMovie/canContainMovieFragments] is `YES` and at least one `moof` box is present after the `moov` box.

## Determining fragment support

- **canContainMovieFragments**: A Boolean value that indicates whether fragments can extend the movie file.
